resources.string: 4 Growth Stocks With 116% to 247% Upside, According to Wall Street

What you need to know


A new update for the Tesla app adds support for Home screen widgets for the first time.
Users can see when their car is charging, whether Sentry mode is enabled, and more.
Other improvements include a refreshed interface, easier access…

Tesla has quietly updated its iPhone app to add a slew of new features not least new iOS 14 Home screen widgets in two different sizes.r\nReleased as version 4.0.0, the new Tesla app can be downloaded… [+1659 chars]
